mains.name: Lemon Caesar
mains.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with our homemade lemon Caesar dressing, croutons, and shredded parmesan cheese.

mains.name: Lemon Surf & Turf
mains.description: A grilled, queen-cut ribeye served with shrimp and lemon scallop alfredo.

mains.name: Creamy Lemon Sage
mains.description: Chicken breast sautéed with fresh sage and prosciutto. Served atop creamy lemon asiago linguini.

mains.name: Lemon Haddock
mains.description: Fresh haddock dipped in beer batter and fried to a golden brown, served with lemon wedges.

mains.name: Lemon Tenderloin
mains.description: Tenderloin tips, sautéed with bacon and mushrooms and finished with a bourbon-lemon BBQ sauce.

mains.name: Lemon Chicken Marsala
mains.description: Boneless chicken breast sautéed with mushrooms and finished in a lemon marsala and cream reduction.
